title: Process Security Deposit Refund
description: A tenant has moved out. After inspection, the agent must calculate and process the security deposit refund.

tasks.description: Review the move-out inspection report and identify any damages beyond normal wear and tear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a broken window and stains on the carpet.

tasks.description: Get repair cost estimates for the identified damages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains quotes for window repair and carpet cleaning.

tasks.description: Calculate the refund amount by deducting repair costs from the original deposit and generate a disposition letter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the refund and creates the required legal notice.
